title: Calculus of a piecewise defined function part - a

content.description: Let f be a function defined by f(x)={2x−x2 for x ≤ 1, x2+ kx +p for x>1.
content.question: For what values of k and p will f be continuous and differentiable at x=1 ?

frqParts.text: For what values of k and p will f be continuous and differentiable at x=1 ?

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Confirm whether hypotheses or conditions of a selected definition, theorem, or test have been satisfied.
